subject: United States Women's Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: So Yeon Ryu, who was 8 when Se Ri Pak became the first South Korean to win the Open in 1998, beat Hee Kyung Seo by three strokes in an all-South Korean playoff Monday.
snippet: So Yeon Ryu, who was 8 when Se Ri Pak became the first South Korean to win the Open in 1998, beat Hee Kyung Seo by three strokes in an all-South Korean playoff Monday.
